QAPair.Question: What is (are) Allergic rhinitis - what to ask your doctor - child ?
QAPair.Answer: Allergies to pollen, dust mites, and animal dander are also called allergic rhinitis . Hay fever is another word often used for this problem when it is due to pollen. Symptoms are usually a watery, runny nose and itching in your eyes and nose.
